thread.section_title: Devon Valley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hidden gem in Stellenbosch
thread.title_full: Hidden gem in Stellenbosch - Review of Devon Valley Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Kevin M
title: Hidden gem in Stellenbosch
text: Great place for conference or workshop with excellent food and wine. The hotel is located on a working wine estate. Great view over the Devonvalley and right next door to JC Le Roux wine estate..You have to try the food and wine paring at the flavours restaurant.
